markers.marker: Nugi-chan borrows flower lines to address Amalia.
Because Nugi-chan is a web site mascot, she knows that she is digital and has AI.
Nugi-chan comments that she can see female Corrin's panties.
Tracker to see if Nugi-chan's epilogue was earned in a game or accessed via the epilogue gallery.
If Nugi-chan's first hand is bad in a game with Elizabeth, she'll pretend to be pure and innocent (for a line).
Nugi-chan transports Elizabeth's "first blood" remark to a new context.
Nugi-chan expects that Elizabeth will lose first.
Nugi-chan has one real "finished" line and a few more that are just banter.
Nugi-chan was once 12.5% of the game!
Nugi-chan inappropriately suggests that she's interested in some babysitting from Kim Possible.
Nugi-chan wants Kizuna to take her bra off next, which she will.
Nugi-chan incorrectly claims that sexy bras are better than cute ones.
Busty Nugi-chan makes fun of petite Kizuna. Probably because Kizuna is cuter.
Kyu's outfit makes for good material. Not MUCH material, though.
Nugi-chan + Marinette = Frennch maid.
Nugi-chan calls Mia an "Ace-high Attorney".
Nugi-chan teases Mia for her short appearance in her debut game.
When an embarrassed girl removes her first major item, Nugi-chan says "we've updated your privacy policy".
Nugi-chan says she'll live-tweet Raven's stripping.
Nugi-chan mimics Sakuya's introduction of Remilia by introducing the player.
Nugi-chan could cosplay Belfast.
Nugi-chan meets the "Nelson" comparison halfway with a pun.
Ideally, the flames would burn off a person's entire outfit.
Nugi-chan makes "SPH" remarks when a male player reveals a small crotch. She has the same comments for male NPCs but does not set a marker to remember this.
Nugi-chan's bad hand doesn't compare to a lifetime of disappointment.
Nugi-chan compares the player's small size to her lipstick.
Like the player, Nugi-chan sometimes suffers from the "Submit Query" image loading placeholder.
